summary: The customer asked questions about Contoso Wireless's streaming service, which is an additional subscription that costs $9.99 per month. The customer was informed that they can get a discounted rate of $7.99 per month if they switch to the annual plan. The customer was also informed of the benefits of the streaming service, such as access to a library of movies and TV shows, exclusive content, and discounts on movie tickets and rentals. To sign up for the annual plan, the customer needs to log into their account and select the annual plan option.
